description:
The apprentice goddesses explore their strong points and brainstorm ways to improve job interviews. Meanwhile, the older girls borrow a ping pong table and think of a "new table tennis club".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Play with Interviews and the Table Tennis Club
Mensetsu to Takkyuu Bu de Asobou
面接と卓球部で遊ぼう
